snippet.title: poatransporte
snippet.description: Web Tool of the Municipality of Porto Alegre and Company Public Transportation and Circulation (EPTC): PoaTransporte (http://www.poatransporte.com.br/), which provides information about the city's public transportation lines showing the bus itinerary, bus stops and taxi points. Developed in PHP and MySQL, uses the Google Maps API. It also provides an API for reading and extracting data.
